text: Flemming Ladefoged Hansen (September 11, 1948 – July 14, 2013) was a Danish handball player who competed in the 1972 Summer Olympics.Sports-Reference profile http://afdoede.dk/index.php?page=visannonce&id;=1134477233 He played his club handball with Fredericia KFUM, and was the top goalscorer of the 1971, 1972, 1973, 1974, 1975, and 1976 Danish Handball League seasons.Topscorere siden 1946 - Herrer at Danish Handball Federation In 1972 he was part of the Denmark national handball team which finished thirteenth in the Olympic tournament. He played all five matches and scored 27 goals. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Danish male handball players Category:Olympic handball players of Denmark Category:Handball players at the 1972 Summer Olympics
title: Flemming Hansen (handballer)
